LanguageData.VCE_SimpleBake.label: simple bake
LanguageData.VCE_SimpleBake.description: A simple bake quickly cooked from a few ingredients and flour.
LanguageData.VCE_FineBake.label: fine bake
LanguageData.VCE_FineBake.description: A complex bake assembled with care from a wide selection of ingredients and flour.
LanguageData.VCE_LavishBake.label: lavish bake
LanguageData.VCE_LavishBake.description: A masterpiece of the culinary arts, this bake nourishes the body, mind, and soul.
LanguageData.VCE_GourmetBake.label: gourmet bake
LanguageData.VCE_GourmetBake.description: A culinary work of art, characterized by refined, even elaborate preparation and presentation of an aesthetically balanced, albeit low quantity bake.
